text: The flag of Autlán () has two horizontal stripes, the big strip is red and the smal strip white with the coat of arms of Autlán de Navarro (toponim glyph). It was adopted in 1998. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code Red #C90016 White #FFFFFF ==References== Autlan Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Autlán
